messages.message: Following up on this thread for Docs... Can someone please clarify for me: what is the recommended method to extract *multipage tables* in Build 24.02+? In previous versions, we recommended object detection + reasoning prompt, but on `aihub-uat` today, I'm getting about the same results with and without object detection + an extraction prompt. Slightly better _without_ object detection, actually. A reasoning prompt always results in `No value found.` So, it seems like the best way to extract multipage tables is with no object detection + extraction prompt. :question-block:

Thanks for the feedback, @melissa.amos â€” in our testing, multipage table extraction is usually better with object detection (i.e. using Form Recognizer), and using reasoning prompt (extraction prompt pipeline will be supported from 24.04). Can you share your example? @Rakesh @Lalit
